AREA.description: The area of the pistachio in the image, likely in pixel units

PERIMETER.description: The perimeter of the pistachio in the image, likely in pixel units

MAJOR_AXIS.description: The length of the major axis of the pistachio in the image, likely in pixel units

MINOR_AXIS.description: The length of the minor axis of the pistachio in the image, likely in pixel units

ECCENTRICITY.description: The eccentricity of the pistachio, a measure of how much the shape deviates from a circle

EQDIASQ.description: The equivalent diameter of a circle with the same area as the pistachio, likely in pixel units

SOLIDITY.description: The solidity of the pistachio, a measure of the spatial density of the shape

CONVEX_AREA.description: The area of the smallest convex polygon that can contain the area of the pistachio, likely in pixel units

EXTENT.description: The ratio of the pistachio area to the area of the bounding box

ASPECT_RATIO.description: The ratio of the major axis length to the minor axis length

ROUNDNESS.description: A measure of the roundness of the pistachio

COMPACTNESS.description: A measure of the compactness of the pistachio

SHAPEFACTOR_1.description: A shape factor of the pistachio, specific meaning unknown

SHAPEFACTOR_2.description: A shape factor of the pistachio, specific meaning unknown

SHAPEFACTOR_3.description: A shape factor of the pistachio, specific meaning unknown

SHAPEFACTOR_4.description: A shape factor of the pistachio, specific meaning unknown
